text.section: No person shall be convicted of prostitution solely on the uncorroborated testimony of a patron.

No person shall be convicted of promoting prostitution solely on the uncorroborated testimony of a person whose prostitution activity he is alleged to have advanced or from whose prostitution activity he is alleged to have profited.

law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 255, effective January 1, 1975.
